areyouhappy.message: Are you happy about Turn Off the Lights?

description.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the videos as if you were in the cinema. Works for YouTube™ and Beyond.

deseastereggs.message: Pressing the T key adds a theater curtain to the dark layer
